text: Bokundara is a city in Colombo District, Western Province, Sri Lanka. It is about 17 kilometers south of Colombo. It is surrounded by the suburbs of Moratuwa, Piliyandala, Maharagama, Pannipitiya and Boralesgamuwa. The Bokundara Dedicated Economic Center is the main attraction. The road connecting Colombo and Horana, known as the 120 bus route, passes through Bokundara. Category:Settlements in Sri Lanka
title: Bokundara
